snippet: The pitcher Chris Carpenter, who has not won a game since Game 7 of last year’s World Series, will start for St. Louis in Washington on Wednesday night.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that St Louis Cardinals pitcher Chris Carpenter, who has not won a game since Game 7 of 2011 World Series, will start in Game 3 of National League division series against the Washington Nationals.
lead_paragraph: The pitcher Chris Carpenter, who has not won a game since Game 7 of last year’s World Series, will start for St. Louis in Washington on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Carpenter Is at His Best With Most at Stake
headline.print_headline: Carpenter Is at His Best With Most at Stake
